meanings.definition: A person or organization that employs people.
meanings.sent1: Many employers offer health insurance to their employees.
meanings.sent2: The employers at the company are very supportive of their staff.
meanings.sent3: The employers decided to have a team-building day at the park.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, employers are like the captains of a ship.
meanings.sent5: Good employers are hard to find, but they make all the difference in a workplace.

meanings.definition: To make use of or engage the services of someone.
meanings.sent1: Small businesses often employ local talent to help with various tasks.
meanings.sent2: She decided to employ a professional painter to redo her living room.
meanings.sent3: The magician employed a clever trick to entertain the audience.
meanings.sent4: In times of need, we must employ all our resources to overcome challenges.
meanings.sent5: To succeed in the project, we must employ our creativity and determination.
